content.rendered: Bringing individuals together for a sport brings out some of their most favorable characteristics of camaraderie, compassion and empathy. By engaging the civil society actively in its social welfare initiatives Smile Foundation aims to bring real and long lasting change in the lives of the most deserving children and families. Employees from over 20 leading corporate came together for a one of its kind initiative – the Elegant Charity Football Tournament 2015, to ensure education for 250 underprivileged children under Smile Foundation’s Mission Education programme. Participating corporate included Adobe, Cerner, Thomson Reuters, Bet on India, Shneider Electric, Herbalife, Target, Citrix, Rubric PR, Informatica, TUV Reihnland, Euromonitor, Elegant Properties, and many others. Thomson Reuters won the tournament, making the coveted cup theirs. Elegant Properties, Herbalife and Giftxoxo partnered with Smile Foundation for the soccer tournament held at the XLR8 Indoor Arena in Bengaluru.
